statements: SELECT * FROM energy_reports;
SELECT room_id, energy_usage, report_date FROM energy_reports;
SELECT * FROM energy_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT room_id, energy_usage FROM energy_reports ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT room_id, energy_usage, report_date FROM energy_reports WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_reports WHERE room_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date DESC, energy_usage ASC;
SELECT report_id, energy_usage FROM energy_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM energy_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT room_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM energy_reports GROUP BY room_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT room_id, MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM energy_reports GROUP BY room_id ORDER BY max_energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage_reports WHERE gas_usage > 100
SELECT room_id, electricity_usage FROM energy_usage_reports ORDER BY electricity_usage DESC
SELECT room_name, water_usage FROM energy_usage_reports WHERE water_usage < 50
SELECT house_section, SUM(electricity_usage) AS total_electricity_usage FROM rooms JOIN energy_usage_reports USING (room_id) GROUP BY house_section
SELECT * FROM energy_usage_reports WHERE electricity_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM energy_usage_reports WHERE electricity_usage > 100
SELECT room_id, electricity_usage, water_usage FROM energy_usage_reports ORDER BY electricity_usage DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT room_name, gas_usage FROM rooms WHERE has_windows = TRUE
SELECT sum(electricity_usage) AS total_electricity_usage, sum(water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM energy_usage_reports
SELECT * FROM energy_usage_reports WHERE gas_usage < 50 ORDER BY room_id ASC
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsageReport;
SELECT room_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyUsageReport ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT room_id, room_name, room_size FROM RoomDetails WHERE room_size > 100;
SELECT * FROM RoomOptimization WHERE room_id = 3;
SELECT room_id, energy_usage, timestamp FROM EnergyUsageReport WHERE room_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsageReport WHERE energy_usage > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT room_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM EnergyUsageReport GROUP BY room_id HAVING total_energy_usage > 100;
SELECT eur.room_id, eur.energy_usage, ro.optimization_recommendation FROM EnergyUsageReport eur JOIN RoomOptimization ro ON eur.room_id = ro.room_id;
SELECT rd.room_name, AVG(eur.energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM RoomDetails rd JOIN EnergyUsageReport eur ON rd.room_id = eur.room_id GROUP BY rd.room_name ORDER BY avg_energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM RoomDetails rd LEFT JOIN EnergyUsageReport eur ON rd.room_id = eur.room_id WHERE eur.timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM RoomEnergyUsageReport
SELECT room_name, energy_usage FROM RoomEnergyUsageReport ORDER BY energy_usage DESC
SELECT room_name, room_type FROM RoomDetails WHERE room_type = 'Meeting Room'
SELECT * FROM EnergyOptimizationSuggestions WHERE suggestion_id = 1
SELECT room_name, saving_amount FROM EnergySavings JOIN RoomDetails ON EnergySavings.room_id = RoomDetails.room_id
SELECT room_id, room_name, energy_usage FROM RoomEnergyUsageReport WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC
SELECT room_name, energy_usage FROM RoomEnergyUsageReport WHERE room_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT suggestion_text FROM EnergyOptimizationSuggestions WHERE room_id = 1
SELECT room_name, room_type FROM RoomDetails WHERE room_type = 'Office' ORDER BY room_name ASC
SELECT room_id, SUM(saving_amount) AS total_savings FROM EnergySavings GROUP BY room_id HAVING total_savings > 500
SELECT * FROM Room;
SELECT room_name, house_id FROM Room WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyUsage GROUP BY room_id ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT room_name, temperature FROM RoomTemperature WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-02-01';
SELECT room_id, AVG(occupants) AS avg_occupancy FROM RoomOccupancy GROUP BY room_id HAVING avg_occupancy > 5;
SELECT * FROM Room;
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM Room WHERE house_id = 1;
SELECT SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed, date FROM EnergyUsage GROUP BY date;
SELECT AVG(cost) AS average_cost, room_id FROM EnergyCost WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY room_id;
SELECT room_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM RoomTemperature WHERE date = '2022-02-15';
